Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot DSCW150/Gold 8.1 MP - Great Camera
Reviews.Author: bartab15pm
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the purchase of the product.  We are still learning to use all the bells and whistles it has.  In some cases it is more then we really need.  This camera has been very easy to use and takes great pictures.  We would definitely recommend it to anyone interested in a good quality family use friendly camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice product
Reviews.Author: Ben J "sportsman"
Reviews.Content: Nice service..no problem at all with the product...very quick service..The camera is very cool..I really like it...it has a lot of interesting functions...I recommend it for everyone..

Reviews.Title: Solid
Reviews.Author: J. Williams "JW"
Reviews.Content: Cybershot is a solid little camera. Doesn't have all the bells and whistles some cameras do now, but if you are just looking for a solid camera to catch memories with friends and family at a great price this might be the camera for you.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: L. Caetano
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research before choosing my camera because I wanted to be sure I got something great and easy to use. I am so glad that I spent the time doing that because this is an AWESOME camera. It has a big screen so that you can actually see what you are taking a picture of. It has so many features that are very cool and may I just add that it takes awesome pictures. I am not a very photogenic person and let me tell you I am even happy with the way the pictures come out. So if you are thinking of this camera let me tell you that you won't be dissapointed!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Angela L. Knezevich "ALK"
Reviews.Content: The camera is fantastic. Camera fits in my purse, great pixel ratio, great zoom. You couldn't ask for anything more for the price... well except ask for more color options. I generally use a SLR Nikon. This is the perfect option for downsizing when the SLR is just too large to take along.

Reviews.Title: best affordable camera!
Reviews.Author: T. Keawkingkeo
Reviews.Content: really like it! especially the color. I carry it with me everyday since it's light. The camera's delivered on time and in a good condition. Thanks again Adorama.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Mariposa
Reviews.Content: I love this camera and it was at a great price. I only wish the date printe on the pics.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: D. Mckie
Reviews.Content: It was more than I had expected and at a very good price.A very neat product.

Reviews.Title: In a word. Great!
Reviews.Author: Boris M. Kroner
Reviews.Content: I am no photography expert, but I love this little camera.  The pictures are crisp, the detect smile feature is cool and it is easy enough for me to use both indoors and outdoors and get great results with every shot.Def. recommended.

Reviews.Title: Small, easy to use & girly
Reviews.Author: Diana Rodriguez Borbor "Diana de Strahm"
Reviews.Content: I really love this camera, and it has exeded my expectations.I read horrible reviews about it, and  let me tell you the pictures are grainy when there's no light what so ever! I uploaded a picture from my daughter ballet recital, and its pretty good under the low light circumstances.This is an small pocket camera that fits almost everyware! I always have it in my purse.The battery life it's amazing I lasts at least 300 shots with flash, and viewing photos, and uploading all in the same charge.In conclusion, this is an excelent canera, for every day life, with cool features that you will discover in time, I highly recomend it if you have children! the steady shot is the best and it captures very well moving kids!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot DSCW150
Reviews.Author: Jose V. Llovera "Jose V. Llovera"
Reviews.Content: Nice camera, better tahn last one of 7.2 MP, and the Smile Shutter function very well, good product at good price, I will put in this new camera the last manual zoom, is better than the digital buttoms (+ , -) zoom.

Reviews.Title: This camera is fantastic!!
Reviews.Author: Brian D. Hodgson "tigerfanbrian"
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera as a Christmas gift, and we took a ton of pictures while visiting family.  There was very little instruction needed in order to operate the camera, as the ICONS and screen displays make this camera easy to use.  The screen makes it easy to see pictures taken.  I love it!!

Reviews.Title: For the electronic impaired
Reviews.Author: J. Eskew
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife who has problems with anything electronic; she just doesn't have any luck operating the things. This camera has an 'Easy' setting, does everything for her except actually push the button to take the picture. It has stablization, face & smile recongition, a large LED screen and of course auto exposure. I also bought a 4G card, so she will have fewer trips to the computer to upload. Don't get me started on that adventure!

Reviews.Title: Loved it
Reviews.Author: J. Odriozola "Odri"
Reviews.Content: Took the camera on a recent trip loaded with a 4 gigabite memory stick and went shutter happywith over 300 pics and room for more. Easy to use all the features are at your fingertips. Cant go wrong for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: desertPaul
Reviews.Content: I was very pleasantly surprised at what a great little camera this was when I received it. The music with the slide show was a great feature. The quality of the pictures is great and the features that are in this camera are too numerous to list. I have a Cyber Shhot that is a couple of years old and the difference between them is amazing. Both take great pictures, but this one goes that extra yard to make it a real joy to play with. The service from amazon was great, as always.

Reviews.Title: Nice Little camera
Reviews.Author: R. Mishra
Reviews.Content: Its a beautiful camera with great features..i haven't yet found any cons as such and am sure that no-one could have any regrets buying this..

Reviews.Title: great camera!
Reviews.Author: Whitney Moro "bradymama"
Reviews.Content: this is the 4th digital camera I've owned, and is by far the best! it is small and lightweight, takes PHENOMENAL pictures, and the different modes are very useful!  would definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: Fast shooting,great display
Reviews.Author: L. Groh
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera. It's great when you have small kids and need to get the shot before they move. I mostly wanted a camera for that feature alone. The slideshow feature is fun and the LCD dispaly is crystal clear.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Sean P. Warren
Reviews.Content: I received this camera for Christmas from my fiance.  The digital camera I was previously using was a 3.2MP, Olympus.  Great camera but a little older.  The Sony blows it out of the water.  It's easy to use and has tons of features.  I was a little intimidated by the manual and all the symbols for different features.  But the camera has on screen explanations for everything.  Battery life is awesome, I'm soooo happy I don't have to keep buying AA's anymore.  I can't wait to use this little device during our spring vacation.  Best camera I've ever owned by far!

Reviews.Title: VERY SATISFIED
Reviews.Author: J. PICORALE "MOM"
Reviews.Content: ORDERED THIS CAMERA FOR MY DAUGHTER FOR CHRISTMAS.  EVERYTHING EXPLAINED ABOUT THE CAMERA WAS CORRECT.  SHE LOVES IT,  TAKES GREAT PICS AND IS EASY TO USE.  HAS A GREAT SCREEN SIZE AND BATTERY LIFE.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, sleek and functional
Reviews.Author: betelgeuse19
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera, as I said, it's sleek and functional.Ease to use as well.. I am very satisfied with this camera for the price and what I got. And it has the perfect size for what I need.

Reviews.Title: Great choice
Reviews.Author: Charles Crane
Reviews.Content: Had been doing research for several months and finally selected the Sony. Made the right deceision, everything I expected.

Reviews.Title: cybershot
Reviews.Author: Janis Mignacca "janis"
Reviews.Content: amazing camera form sony. delivered on time at the best price from amazon. love it.bought my flat screen from amazon too!

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD PRODUCT FOR ENTERTAINMENT
Reviews.Author: M. Barberia
Reviews.Content: It's a very good camera for those wich are not professional photographers, but do work with a camera and need good quality and definition. I use it to record my fitness and dancing classes , so then I could show them or see them to correct some mystakes. I also use it for personal picturs with friends at night easy to carry in any bag or pocket.It is really a very good product equation  COST-BENEFIT

Reviews.Title: It's great!
Reviews.Author: Chago
Reviews.Content: It's my first digital camera and I really like it.You can take amazing pictures with it and you can enjoy of a lot of extras too.

Reviews.Title: Mostly good.
Reviews.Author: Lance Legstrong
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my girlfriend who had been using an older Canon SD200, and she had a lot of trouble adjusting to it.  This camera is capable of very good image quality, but the menus and controls are not so easy to navigate.  Make sure you turn off the Auto-ISO function or else you will get noisy pics.  And from what I can tell, you can  not turn off Auto-ISO in the "Easy" or "Auto" modes, which makes them useless...maybe I just haven't figured it out yet.  SteadyShot works well.  I like that you can zoom to 100% in the playback function, so you can really see if the picture you just took was sharp or not.

Reviews.Title: OMG Sony made this...??
Reviews.Author: Boris
Reviews.Content: Well let me tell you where I come from first so that you guys know that I am not just trying to criticize this. I have owned 3 sony cybershot cameras before and let me tell you, this is the worst one of them all. The last camera I purchased was DSC-P150 from over two years ago, and pictures looked fantastic!! With or without the flash. Colors were always crisp, sharpness was excellent very very sharp! So I figured I needed another pocket camera, I mean after two years, sony has probably made better models. Well when I got DSC-W150 and took a first picture which looked very fine on it's nice big display, I then transfered it to PC and was horrified! The picture looked very very grainy, bluish, purplish, grayish spots are around most of the objects in the pictures. Sharpness is no good, objects blur around the edges..OMG!! I couldn't believe it, even after playing around and tweaking all kind of settings it's just HORRIBLE. Sony wants $200 for this? You guys lost you mind. Fix it! Bring back DSC-P150. By the way, I recommend any of DSC-P100, P150, or P-200. You can still find them on ebay used, as they been discountinued. But trust me this is just a waste of your money...Boris

Reviews.Title: Great camera at a great price
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: This a great value.  The Sony cameras are top in features and picture quality.  The DSCW150 is easy to use and the steady shot feature works great.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Il faut apprécier la vie."
Reviews.Content: It is my belief that this is the best digital camera (of this class) on the market.  Photos are always clear and it is indeed user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot
Reviews.Author: M. Lett
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. Takes great pictures no matter what lighting or setting. Perfect for the beginning photographer or the expert!

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Teresa Wood
Reviews.Content: We have had this camera for about a month and really love it.  It's super fast, really small, and has a nice view screen.  I like the fun slide show option where you can download your own songs and play the pictures to music. How fun.  It takes wonderful pictures too.  We took it to the beach and got some wonderful sunset pics.  It has a nice zoom too. The only thing we don't like is it doesn't take double a batteries, and the place to plug it into the computer is on the bottom which isn't very convienient.  I would highly reccomend this camera to anyone who wants a really nice point and shoot camera with lots of fun features.

Reviews.Title: BEST EVER SONY DIGITAL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Gertrude I. Carroll
Reviews.Content: LOVE MY NEW SONY CAMERA.....THE PICTURES ARE SHARP, THE SLIDESHOW WITH MUSIC IS SUCH AN ADDED BONUS....AND THE EASE OF WHICH TO TAKE A PICTURE, WOW!!!!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This Sony camera is a winner.  Small, but powerful, we've used it in a variety of settings and it has never let us down.  I'd recommend it highly.  Sony Cybershot DSCW150/R 8.1MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom with Super Steady Shot (Red)NOTE: Five years have passed since I bought this camera for my wife and she still loves it and uses it constantly.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: J. Espinoza "chudizzle"
Reviews.Content: this is a great overall point-and-shoot camera. has tons of cool features. it's quick at firing shots. great zoom. the auto focus isn't always perfect, but usually on target. haven't used all the functions yet to comment on all it's capabilities. for night shots and long exposures, definitely need a tripod just like any other camera on long exposures. but overall a solid compact camera.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Yuanwei Chen
Reviews.Content: Pros:Generally speaking, this camera is easy to use. The quantity is enough for most non-professional users. The launch time(from pressing power button and ready to take photos) is very short, only 0.8s. The quantity deserves its pixels.Cons:Bad battery time and limited functions.Summary:I recommend to buy a camera in this price. Maybe it is not the best value/price ratio in the range. But you would not regret buying this camera.

Reviews.Title: GREAT!!!!
Reviews.Author: Carol Rabitoy
Reviews.Content: We had no idea of what kind of digital camera to get only a few suggestions from family and friends. Again, we went to Amason for product and information and again were not disappointed and were able to make a decision.  After using and experimenting with our Sony Cybershot we are so satisfied. The pictures also print out like professional on my computer. Thanks for the #1 Products.... with information the possibilities are endless. What fun memories we are capable of capturing now!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Horrible Camera and Customer Service
Reviews.Author: H. Dewey
Reviews.Content: I have now purchased 2 Sony cameras but will never buy from them again.I had this Cybershot camera, and started having problems with it after 6 months.  The camera would turn on, but the picture was black.  Everytime I would take a picture it would also be black.  I used their tech support over the phone and two times they were able to walk me through the problem to solve it.  When I asked if I would need to buy the extended warranty they said no  since it was a re-occurring problem.Now my camera is out of warranty, and they are no longer able to walk me through how to fix it over the phone.  Instead they want to charge me $111 just for labor to take a look at the camera and that doesn't include a price for any parts needed.  When I called customer service they said there is nothing that they could do about the problem and that I would just have to pay to have it fixed.  (Not to mention I could buy a new camera for the same price off of Amazon.)IT seems like this is now there way of making money.I will never buy another Sony product, and I hope this doesn't happen to you.  Beware, their customer service is only there to help you when it serves them, but magically they can't fix the problem over the phone anymore when it will benefit them financially not to do so.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Patricia Gibbs
Reviews.Content: This is my second Cybershot. I bought my first one over 5 years ago and it still takes great pictures, however I wanted a new camera because technology has changed so much. Since I really liked my old camera I wanted another Cybershot. My new model Cybershot takes great pictures and has many features yet it's still easy to use. I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: what a shite camera.
Reviews.Author: Joseph Smith
Reviews.Content: picture indoors? dark or grainy.picture outdoors? dark or overexposed.no idea why this camera sucked so bad for us, but seriously it it awful. we are NOT camera snobs! my iphone takes better pics and it's camera is junk.i feel uncomfortable selling it on ebay or craigslist for crying out loud, and i would normally sell those losers anything!

Reviews.Title: Unhappybuyer
Reviews.Author: Kathleen K Kinney
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product from an independent dealer through Amazon.  It was advertised as used but in perfect working order.  This product was received with the lens extended, i.e. in the "on" position. This in spite of the fact that there was no battery in it.  I installed a battery but was not able to retract the lens.  I also purchased a case for this camera for which I had no use when the camera was inoperable. I returned both products immediately and have contacted the seller numerous times asking for a refund of my purchase price.  I paid with my VISA so she got her money immediately, and I have not received my refund from her after many weeks.  I will never again buy a product from an Amazon dealer that is not actually Amazon.  I know of no way to deal with an independent dealer when they do not provide the service advertised.

Reviews.Title: Sony has replaced quality with lower price, smaller size
Reviews.Author: A. B. Crockett "woodpeckerman"
Reviews.Content: Drat!  I should have paid more attention to the negative reviews!  I own a DSC-W100 that takes very sharp photos.  However, it is starting to act up, so I bought a DSC-W150 for a trip to Africa, mostly because of its longer zoom range (30-150 mm equivalent instead of 38-114 mm equivalent).  It arrived only a couple of days before the trip, so I did an incomplete job of checking it out -- my fault, of course.  On the trip, I was raving to my wife about how great it was and proudly showing off the great images on the LCD back at the hotel each night.  But, when we got home and downloaded the images -- TERRIBLE.  Soft, blurry images, even in bright outdoor conditions.  At least half of my pix had to be culled, and many of the ones I've kept are awful, but I want them in the album for their subjects.  Why Sony would let its quality go down, apparently a ubiquitous problem with way too many of their models after the W100, escapes me.  It seems that they've bought into most Americans' fascination with lower price and smaller size and have done so at the expense of picture quality.  Shame on you, Sony.  I have so many of your batteries, rechargers, and memory sticks that I hate to change to another company -- probably Canon -- but I cannot be satisfied with these mushy, washed-out, low-contrast, low-saturation images -- even at 8 megapixels and with "vivid" color selected.  I can only think about the great shots I had to cull.

Reviews.Title: This an average plus camera...Does ok but nothing great like a Canon
Reviews.Author: J. Perez "Mr.Perez"
Reviews.Content: Sony does everything great except camera shots....I will say to leave it to the big boys like Canon or Nikon....This camera is good but not great...I will comparae it to a low calorie beer which is water down and less tasteful....Get the non calorie beer,trust me.

Reviews.Title: Great Value  for a resonable price
Reviews.Author: A. Wesler
Reviews.Content: A nice camera for a resonable price. The shipping is free and the item arrived in a few days. I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Lynn Betsanes
Reviews.Content: This camera was for my almost 12 year old daughter.  It takes great pictures and it's easy to use.  She wanted a touch screen camera but for double the price and not so great reviews we felt this was a much better value.  She really likes it and the color is fun too!

Reviews.Title: Great gift-great price
Reviews.Author: Patricia S. Oconnor
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera as a gift for a family member.  Shopped around and found it on this sight with the best price anywhere.  She absolutely loves this camera.  Amazon comes through again!!

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great price
Reviews.Author: Kristina Hoeflinger "Miss Kris"
Reviews.Content: Once again, Amazon came through for me-I got this camera for my Dad just a couple of days before Christmas.  Amazon shipped it next day for free and it cost $50 less than other sites.

Reviews.Title: A Little Gem of a Device...
Reviews.Author: Marcus Shaffie
Reviews.Content: Pros: - Clear detail & high quality in both photos & videos  - Good battery endurance  - Helpful onboard Menu Guide & Menu System  - Facilitates Automation well (No knowledge of how to set up your shots necessary)  - Compact size  - Feature loaded! Great onboard interactive & PC features...Cons: - Small onboard memory. It IS necessary to purchase a Memory Stick to coulpe with the Camera  - The sometimes grainy look of the LCD Display (though this is not an indication of how the shots/videos look)Hope this helps!!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Marcy
Reviews.Content: I got this for my husband and for work. We needed a wide angle lens and this one was the biggest I could find in a camera this size.  It's working great and we're totally pleased.  You will definately need a memory card for taking lots of pictures, but that's with any camera.  The only thing to be aware of - the "Red" camera was a little cheaper, so I went for that - but my husband and everyone says it looks like a dark pink. Luckily my husband is secure! So, if you're getting it for a man, be aware that the red is pink.

Reviews.Title: DSC-W150 cybershot
Reviews.Author: Axel Ramos Maldonado
Reviews.Content: it is a great camera, I am very fan of sony and let me tell you that this is the best camera that I ever had.

Reviews.Title: Skimpy on Instruction
Reviews.Author: Henry Haggland
Reviews.Content: The Sony camera was a gift to my wife.  I have been using a Canon for over a year and have been very satisfied with those photos.  We have only taken a few indoor family shots with the new Sony but not enough to compare them.  The problem of course is that if you are not a photography enthusiast you have trouble understanding the severalalternatives, of which there are many with the Sony.  My wife wants a perfect picture every time, but doesn't have the patience to change settings for distance, lighting, etc. Sony's 'Easy" setting isn't always the best setting. It is frustrating that Sony put out an instruction pamphlet that was only 36 pages long compared to thetwo 100-page handbooks that came with the Canon camera.(One for the camera and one for printing photos on the computer). This probably isn't a problem if you have the technical interest and use the Sony CD that came with the camera.  It is a problem if your wife blocks out CD-generated instruction manuals.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot
Reviews.Author: Vanina Delucio
Reviews.Content: The camera is perfect. It takes great pictures all on its own. There is no need for you to know about the aperture, focal length or lighting.  The picture colors are amazingly accurate and vibrant. It was sent on time.

Reviews.Title: Received As Described
Reviews.Author: Lynn S.
Reviews.Content: This camera was delivered and received as described by the vendor.  I would certainly do business with them in the future.  My daughter was on a deadline to receive this camera BEFORE leaving for a semester abroad.  We were delighted the product arrived on time and as described.

Reviews.Title: Review for DSCW150
Reviews.Author: R. A. Bhat "vis2k4"
Reviews.Content: This is a good cam for those who are not particular about photography. This gives a good and stable picture. I liked it.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality for printing and viewing on a computer is not good
Reviews.Author: Linda Cohen
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace an aging Kodak Z730.  I wanted a compact camera that would take great pictures with a decent optical zoom (this one has 5X) and an eyepiece viewer.  This camera (the DSC-W150) seemed to have everything I was looking for.  On the large Sony LCD my pictures look spectacular (clear, sharp, etc.), but when I connect the camera to my computer or bring the memory card to a store to print pictures, the quality of my pictures changes dramatically for the worse. The pictures from the Sony camera come out unclear, blurry, etc. My old Kodak camera takes much better pictures than this Sony one does.All I can say is buyer beware on this camera.

Reviews.Title: Loving It Just Fine
Reviews.Author: Andrez Coy
Reviews.Content: I got this item two days after I ordered it and since then its been my new buddy.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot DSCW150
Reviews.Author: Kellie C. Capps "Kel"
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures.  The size of the camera is great if you want something small to carry in a purse or pocket.

Reviews.Title: sony dscw150.
Reviews.Author: Elias El Hage
Reviews.Content: Sony Cybershot DSCW150/G 8.1MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom with Super Steady Shot (Gold)is an excellent digital cam.with very good specifications.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Anna"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a birthday present for my son, and he tells me that it takes great pictures. I cannot give a better review because I am not using it myself, but he's happy with it, and the pictures that he emailed me look great. I might consider buying another one for my other son.

Reviews.Title: Had to return it...
Reviews.Author: M. Nelson
Reviews.Content: First day using this it made some kind of grinding noise and the lens wouldn't retract when I turned it off. So I popped out the battery, put it back in, and it retracted. I turned it back off and the lens wouldn't come out and the screen said to turn the camera off and basically try again. Kept doing that so I returned it for refund. I knew I should have stuck with Canon.

Reviews.Title: No complaints
Reviews.Author: njrcs "njrcs"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a quick point and shoot, that took a good picture and would fit in my pocket.  After spending a week at Walt Disney World, over 300 shots and videos, photos taken in all situations, this camera performed excellent.  Easy to operate, the menu on the camera is simple to operate, camera turns on quickly and can shoot fast.  I never read the instructions supplied with the camera.  I spent weeks quite frankly reviewing cameras and I just became more and more confused what to buy until a friend recommended the Sony.Don't hesitate.

Reviews.Title: show the price
Reviews.Author: William D. Murrey
Reviews.Content: If you can't be open about the price then don't advertise it.  I'm not going to 'add it to my box' jsut to see the price.  What are you hiding?I'll go elsewhere to shop for a camera.

2.7-inch Clear Photo LCD display
Face Detection; Smile Shutter mode
15 MB internal memory; capture images to Memory Stick Duo/Pro Duo media
